settings.hideRightSidebarLabel: Hide right sidebar in table view

settings.backupEnableDesc: Capture a snapshot before writing Markdown so you can roll back accidental changes.
settings.backupCapacityDesc: When the total size exceeds this limit, the oldest snapshots are deleted. Default: 200 MB.

onboarding.helpFileContent:
## TileLineBase Template
Feature: Step 0: What you get
Description: Use the first row as the column template; the sample rows below show you what the table can display.

## TileLineBase Open
Feature: Step 1: Open the table
Description: Right-click a note or use the command palette to switch from Markdown to the TileLineBase table view.

## TileLineBase Columns
Feature: Step 2: Read the headings
Description: The very first H2 heading defines the column names; every following H2 becomes a data row.

## TileLineBase Fill
Feature: Step 3: Enter values
Description: Click a cell to start typing, press Enter to confirm; edits are saved back to the note automatically.

## TileLineBase Paste
Feature: Step 4: Paste from sheets
Description: Copy rows from Excel or another table and paste鈥攙alues will drop into matching columns.

## TileLineBase Filter
Feature: Step 5: Filter & sort
Description: Use the header icons to add filters or order the list; save them as named views for quick reuse.

## TileLineBase Group
Feature: Step 6: Organise views
Description: Group frequently used filter views so teammates can jump straight to the right perspective.

## TileLineBase Export
Feature: Step 7: Turn rows into notes
Description: Select rows and export or promote them鈥攏ew notes are created with backlinks inserted automatically.

## TileLineBase Shortcuts
Feature: Step 8: Keep it close
Description: Bind a hotkey to reopen the table and pin this help note to your sidebar when you need a refresher.
onboarding.createHelpFailed: TileLineBase failed to create the help document. Check the console for details.
onboarding.openHelpFailed: TileLineBase could not open the help document.
